Package ir.rahyab.hermes.adm.subscribersadmin.subscribersadmin.controller

Class SubscribersController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ir.rahyab.hermes.adm.subscribersadmin.subscribersadmin.controller.SubscribersController
  • @RestController
public class SubscribersController
extends java.lang.Object
    The SubscribersController class provides web methods to create consumers,get list of consumers and basic Auth,key Auth get list of credentials,acl,ip restrictions and get list of ip white list and rate limitting about Consumer Also, It includes saving the history of changes in the Audit Trail Management System. API specification in SubscribersController using OpenAPI.

    • Method Detail

      • consumers

        @RequestMapping(value="/consumers",
                method=POST,
                produces="application/json")
@ResponseBody
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> consumers​(@RequestParam
                                                                           java.lang.String username,
                                                                           @RequestParam
                                                                           java.lang.String custom_id,
                                                                           @RequestParam
                                                                           java.lang.String refrence,
                                                                           @RequestParam
                                                                           java.lang.String description)
        Creates a new consumer in kong database(postgres database). Creates a new key in Redis database in the form of "ACT:" + username Response status codes include 201,204,409,404,400,500 201 status code:Created , 204 status code:Consumer does not create in database , 500 status code:Internal Server Error 409 status code:Consumer created before , 404 status code:Audit trail management path not found , 400 status code:Bad request
        Parameters:
        username - the String consumer or user of a service,The unique username of the Consumer. You must send either this field or custom_id with the request.
        custom_id - the String Field for storing an existing unique ID for the Consumer - useful for mapping Kong with users in your existing database. You must send either this field or username with the request.
        refrence - the String Refrence number for saving changes in postgres database by audit trail management system.
        description - the String description for saving changes in postgres database by audit trail management system.
        Returns:
        status code the ResponseEntity<String> object representing 201,204,409,404,400,500

      • consumers

        @RequestMapping(value="/consumers",
                method=GET,
                produces="application/json")
@ResponseBody
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> consumers​(@RequestParam(defaultValue="3")
                                                                           java.lang.Integer size,
                                                                           @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                           java.lang.String offset)
        Get consumer list, page by page. Response status codes include 200,500. 200 status code:Successful , 500 status code:Internal Server Error
        Parameters:
        size - the Integer size of each page.
        offset - the String start of point for next page.
        Returns:
        status code the ResponseEntity<String> object representing 200,500

      • basicAuth

        @RequestMapping(value="/consumers/{CONSUMER}/basic-auth",
                method=POST,
                produces="application/json")
@ResponseBody
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> basicAuth​(@RequestParam
                                                                           java.lang.String consumer,
                                                                           @RequestParam
                                                                           java.lang.String username,
                                                                           @RequestParam
                                                                           java.lang.String password,
                                                                           @RequestParam
                                                                           java.lang.String refrence,
                                                                           @RequestParam
                                                                           java.lang.String description)
        Associate a basicAuth's credential to an existing Consumer object. A Consumer can have many credentials. Response status codes include 201,404,400,500 201 status code:Created , 500 status code:Internal Server Error , 404 status code:Audit trail management path not found , 400 status code:Bad request
        Parameters:
        consumer - the String The id or username property of the Consumer entity to associate the credentials to.
        username - the String The username to use in the basic authentication credential.
        password - the String The password to use in the basic authentication credential.
        refrence - the String Refrence number for saving changes in postgres database by audit trail management system.
        description - the String description for saving changes in postgres database by audit trail management system.
        Returns:
        status code the ResponseEntity<String> object representing 201,404,400,500

      • basicAuth

        @RequestMapping(value="/consumers/{USERNAME_OR_ID}/basic-auth",
                method=GET,
                produces="application/json")
@ResponseBody
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> basicAuth​(@RequestParam
                                                                           java.lang.String usernameOrId,
                                                                           @RequestParam(defaultValue="3")
                                                                           java.lang.Integer size,
                                                                           @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                           java.lang.String offset)
        Retrieve basicAuth credentials associated with a consumer, page by page. Response status codes include 200,500. 200 status code:Successful , 500 status code:Internal Server Error
        Parameters:
        usernameOrId - the String The username or id of the consumer whose credentials need to be listed.
        size - the Integer size of each page.
        offset - the String start of point for next page.
        Returns:
        status code the ResponseEntity<String> object representing 200,500

      • acls

        @RequestMapping(value="/consumers/{CONSUMER}/acls",
                method=POST,
                produces="application/json")
@ResponseBody
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> acls​(@RequestParam
                                                                      java.lang.String consumer,
                                                                      @RequestParam
                                                                      java.lang.String group,
                                                                      @RequestParam
                                                                      java.lang.String refrence,
                                                                      @RequestParam
                                                                      java.lang.String description)
        Restrict access to a Service or a Route by adding Consumers to allowed or denied lists using arbitrary ACL groups. Response status codes include 201,404,400,500 201 status code:Created , 500 status code:Internal Server Error , 404 status code:Audit trail management path not found , 400 status code:Bad request
        Parameters:
        consumer - the String The username or id of the Consumer.
        group - the String The arbitrary group name to associate with the consumer.
        refrence - the String Refrence number for saving changes in postgres database by audit trail management system.
        description - the String description for saving changes in postgres database by audit trail management system.
        Returns:
        status code the ResponseEntity<String> object representing 201,404,400,500

        @RequestMapping(value="/consumers/{CONSUMER}/plugins",
                method=POST,
                produces="application/json")
@ResponseBody
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> plugins​(@RequestParam
                                                                         java.lang.String consumer,

                                                                         @RequestParam
                                                                         java.lang.String refrence,
                                                                         @RequestParam
                                                                         java.lang.String description)
        Restrict access to a Service or a Route by either allowing or denying IP addresses. Response status codes include 201,404,400,500 201 status code:Created , 500 status code:Internal Server Error , 404 status code:Audit trail management path not found , 400 status code:Bad request
        Parameters:
        consumer - the String The username or id of the Consumer.
        ipWhiteList - the String The ip white list or allowed ip's.
        refrence - the String Refrence number for saving changes in postgres database by audit trail management system.
        description - the String description for saving changes in postgres database by audit trail management system.
        Returns:
        status code the ResponseEntity<String> object representing 201,404,400,500

      • plugins

        @RequestMapping(value="/consumers/{CONSUMER}/plugins_rate_limitting",
                method=POST,
                produces="application/json")
@ResponseBody
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> plugins​(@RequestParam
                                                                         java.lang.String consumer,
                                                                         @RequestParam
                                                                         int second,
                                                                         @RequestParam
                                                                         int minute,
                                                                         @RequestParam
                                                                         int hour,
                                                                         @RequestParam
                                                                         java.lang.String refrence,
                                                                         @RequestParam
                                                                         java.lang.String description)
        Rate limit how many HTTP requests can be made in a given period of seconds, minutes, hours. Response status codes include 201,404,400,500 201 status code:Created , 500 status code:Internal Server Error , 404 status code:Audit trail management path not found , 400 status code:Bad request
        Parameters:
        consumer - the String The username or id of the Consumer.
        second - the int The number of HTTP requests that can be made per second.
        minute - the int The number of HTTP requests that can be made per minute.
        hour - the int The number of HTTP requests that can be made per hour.
        refrence - the String Refrence number for saving changes in postgres database by audit trail management system.
        description - the String description for saving changes in postgres database by audit trail management system.
        Returns:
        status code the ResponseEntity<String> object representing 201,404,400,500
